title: Lakshmi Bangle - Auspicious Diamond & Gemstone Kada
materials: Emerald. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This breathtaking bangle features a central, stylized Lakshmi motif, adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. A striking Ruby and Emerald accent the design, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The flexible open bangle shank showcases a delicate leaf pattern also fully encrusted with brilliant cut diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, highlighting the intricate detailing.
occasions: and festive celebrations. Its classic design also complements modern ethnic wear for special events.
description: A timeless heirloom piece, handcrafted with unmatched artistry and attention to detail. The Lakshmi motif invokes blessings of wealth and prosperity, making it an auspicious and cherished possession. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure lasting brilliance and value. Made for everyday wear, it will be your favorite!
